project.name: C-C761A-FFMP-06-ST01-DT01-DF08-CF22-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to the function definition. Completed injection.

build_commands.command: awk -v compiler="$SS_CC" '/CC=gcc/{gsub(/gcc/, compiler)};{print}' config.mak.bak > config.mak && true

iopair.name: C-C761A-FFMP-06-ST01-DT01-DF08-CF22-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: remove the audio from a video Malloc a buffer. Copy the input string to the buffer. Search for 'e' in the string. Upon finding 'e', free the buffer, using a pointer that points to that 'e'. If 'e' is the first character in the buffer, everything is OK. However, if e is not the first character in the buffer, this will seg fault.

scoring_formula.formula: (GOOD-01-CENTOS OR GOOD-01-UBUNTU OR GOOD-01-DEBIAN) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
